content: march comes in like a lion and out like a lamb and brings with it windy days these socks were created for the yarn twisters march subscription yarn is hand dyed by calgary s own lily and pine fibre arts yarn 1 skein day lily sock by lily and pine fibre arts 115gr 420 yards or any fingering weight yarn sample knit in colourway sunset on the bay gauge 36 sts by 48 row equal 4 by 4 in stockinette in the round after blocking needles 2 25 mm us 1 40 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions removable stitch marker darning needle finished sizes approx foot circumference worn with approx 0-1 of negative ease size 1 7 women s shoe size 4 - 6 5 size 2 8 women s shoe size 7 - 9 5 size 3 9 women s shoe size 10 - 12 5 pattern is written for magic loop technique
